additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: A gentle blend of active ingredients containing Aloe Vera juice, enriched with Oatmeal and Shea Butter designed to nourish and moisturise your pet's coat.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: The pH level of this product is specifically formulated for use on dogs only. Avoid getting in eyes or ears (human & canine). keep out of reach of children. Always check your dog carefully. If they have any adverse reaction, discontinue use.

description: BX Earth Dog Dry Shampoo Foaming Mouse Aloe Vera Oatmeal & Shea Butter All Natural
name: Earth Dog Dry Shampoo Foaming Mouse Aloe Vera Oatmeal & Shea Butter All Natural
